trans-unit.source: Please use a maximum of %s characters.
Please use a minimum of %s characters.
Please do not reuse any recent password but choose a new unique password.
Please use at least %u uppercase characters.
Please use at least %u lowercase characters.
Please use at least %u characters out of the following: %s
Please use at least %u uppercase letters, %u lowercase letters, %u numbers and %u special characters: %s
Oh no! Your password was found in a database of compromised passwords! Using a password that has been breached is extremely dangerous. Please choose a different password.
